item.title: Julia for Computing
item.description: Julia for Computing The Julia computing language is a relative newcomer to the compute world that is proving to be very powerful and effective for scientific computation. It aims to combine the flexibility and ease-of-use of am interpreted, dynamic language (like Matlab) with the speed and efficiency of a compiled, statically typed language (like C or C++). There are many online resources for learning the Julia language. A good place to start is the documentation provided by the Julia developers at: http://docs.
